message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS

This paper deals with the problem of optimizing security measures in cloud networks while minimizing the impact on performance. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of Moving Target Defense (MTD) mechanisms, which involves the use of AI and machine learning techniques (cs.AI) to optimize security measures. The paper also uses graph theory and connectivity measures (cs.SI) to model the problem of multi-stage attacks. Finally, the paper formulates a Markov Game to compute the optimal strategy for placing detecting mechanisms, which involves the use of game theory and optimization techniques (cs.DS).
